reviews.review:
Un juego que te hace sentir de todo mientras vas cruzando portales, miedo, alegria, tristeza.
Indudablemente tienes que tenerlo si adoras las buenas historias
Simplismente um dos melhores jogos que eu já joguei na minha vida, não vou colocar pontos positivos ou negativos pq pra mim esse jogo é perfeito (eu sou mt fanboy, mal ae)

Fantastic game. I followed the whole lore surrounding the game and was amazed at the effort that had been put into it. I got about 6-7 hours from the single player, which whilst I would have liked more, is what I expect from a modern day game and have yet to touch the CoOp. My main reason for buying was the single player and seeing what happened to Chell, the story line is quite well thought out and some of the puzzles are very interesting. The new elements (faith plates, different liquids and lasers among others) are fantastic and work really well. I'm rather upset that they are charging for skins of the co-op bots as well as hats, it does make the game feel a bit like Team Fortress 2. In terms of presentation the graphics are pretty good, there's some blurry textures here and there but apart from that it looks great, the physics are superb and the music fits really well. All in all I can see myself getting around 15 or so hours out of this without modding etc (doing singleplayer, getting achivs and coop) but not much more than that. Would recommend it to anyone who liked portal but if you didn't then I really doubt this is for you.

2011 egyik legjobbja, 6 év alatt sem készült jobb logikai játék vélemyényem szerint. Faszák a feladványok, a sztori, a grafika, a karakterek, van tönnjátékos rész, moddolható, előrelépés az előző részhez képest, pedig az is korszakos játék volt a maga idejében. 5/5

Its Amazing How a Test chamber feels alive even with the monochrome colors and Robotic parts. You are never truley alone in this game. even with the few characters there are in this game they are a joy to listen to. From Wheatleys awkward Mumbling to Glados's insults and even the robots are a joy.

imortal.

Grande relíquia da Valve, ainda diverte muitos com seu co-op divertido, uma história irônica e bem contada e achievements que dão um desafio extra ao jogo!
Joguei esse jogo minha vida inteira, quando comecei a usar a Steam baixei de novo pela nostalgia e pelo vasto workshop, valeu muito a pena... A ferramenta de construir chambers é muito fácil de usar e dá asas a um novo mundo de estratégias.
Esse é o tipo de jogo clássico que já tem seu lugar na história dos videogames. 10/10

Uno de los juegos de puzzles más ingeniosos y divertidos que he jugado nunca, con un guión lleno de momentos divertidos que te mantiene pegado a la pantalla esperando ver que pasará a continuación.

I want to reset my memories so I can feel how great it is to play this game once again

I think you knew all along this was going to be great. Fantastic, even. All the same, I don't think you'll be prepared for it being this good. I may have buttoned my lip in terms of concrete spoilers, but a mere ten minutes here will yield more memorable moments than you're likely to squeeze out of the entirety of most other games this year. In all aspects of its design, Portal 2 is genius.

Una obra maestra de los ultimos tiempos, aunque es un juego de "la pasada generación" es una de las piezas clave en la historia de los videojuegos y que por su simpleza y originalidad merecen estar con los mas grandes. Un juego que te pondrá a prueba y te dará muchas horas de diversión.

Jogo impactante e ao mesmo tempo empolgante, não há como passar por essa narrativa sem se emocionar com os conflitos gerados entre chell e as IA's futurísticas. Ambientação maravihlosa e que sacada genial... só amores por esse jogo que ficou marcado pra vida.

I recommend both these games to everyone I meet.

Ein absolutes "must have" für Puzzlefreunde, sowie Coop-Fans! Mit diesem Spiel kann man absolut nichts verkehrt machen. Es ist mit sehr viel Liebe zum Detail erstellt worden und macht auch nach mehrerem Durchspielen immer wieder Freude! Einziges Manko ist, dass es ein wenig kurz geraden ist.
